section.name: The Images pages
section.p: In the left frame all images used in the current project are listed. If you select one of them detailed information will be displayed in the right frame. Additionally you have the possibility to upload a new image from your local computer.

Note that it is only possible to upload an image that is already known to the system. To make an image known to the system you must reference it in an Include part. Images that are known but don't already have a file uploaded are marked with a blue "!" in the left frame display.

td.p: The Images page of the Pustefix editor.

tr.td: Box No. 1 contains backup options and the file upload user interface. Backup options appear whenever you change the image by uploading a new image file. The timestamp of the former upload is then displayed in the select box and you can go back to this point of time by choosing the select box entry. The file upload box allows you to select an image on your local filesystem and send it to the Pustefix editor server.
Box No. 2 gives you information on all pages which use the current image. Clicking on a page will display it in the Pages page.
